meanings.sent1: The ultrachic dress she wore to the party turned heads.
meanings.sent2: Her ultrachic outfit always stood out in a crowd.
meanings.sent3: Everyone admired her ultrachic sense of style at the event.
meanings.sent4: The ultrachic decor of the restaurant made it a trendy hotspot.
meanings.sent5: The ultrachic design of the car made it a symbol of luxury and elegance.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is extremely stylish or fashionable.
meanings.sent1: She was known as the ultrachic of the group for her impeccable fashion sense.
meanings.sent2: The ultrachic at the party caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The ultrachic of the office always had the latest trends.
meanings.sent4: The ultrachic of the school was like a fashion icon to the students.
meanings.sent5: The ultrachic of the neighborhood set the standard for style and elegance.
